summary: A group of Egyptian revolutionaries battle leaders and regimes, risking their lives to build a new society of conscience.
cast: Ahmed Hassan|Khalid Abdalla|Magdy Ashour|Ramy Essam|Buthayna Kamel|Aydah El-Kashef|Ragia Omran|Pierre Sioufi|Dina Abdullah|Dina Amer|Sarah Amer|Sherif Boray|Khaled Nagy|Salma Saied|Ahmed Salama|Ahmed Saleh|Alaa Seif|Ramy Shaath
title: The Square
